name: Hooked (adityangm4)
description:
Nine years have passed since Blue and Pink met one night in a modern city of bright lights and loud sounds, spent the night wandering around the city and found love.

The bond that connects them is still there but the love is lost.

Together they decide to relive that night that brought them together to find that lost love again. As the night will progress, their bond shall be tested. 

Guide the couple through various challenges around the city.

A physics-based platformer with simple mechanics and just two-button controls. This game was made in 6 days for the 8 Bits to Infinity - Two Button Jam.

I plan to update this game and improve it in the future.

Fun Fact:- The characters Blue and Pink have been named after the English band and the American singer with the same names respectively. The names of the characters have nothing to do with their colours. It's just a coincidence. True Story.
